There are $N$ events happening at different points in time and locations on a number line.  Each event is defined by a coordinate $x_i$ and a time $t_i$.  A person can travel along the number line at a maximum speed of $V$.  

The person starts at coordinate 0 at time 0.  

Find the maximum number of events the person can attend if:

1. The person starts at coordinate 0 at time 0.
2. The person can choose any starting coordinate at time 0.

You are given a list of events happening at specific times and locations. You can travel at a maximum speed.  Find the maximum number of events you can attend starting from location 0 and the maximum number of events you can attend if you can choose any starting location.
